nodes.text: This male was the former master of Maddie Macatten, a female Bith. Operating as both a merchant and slaver, he maintained premises on Kal'Shebbol, the sector capital of the Kathol sector, including a docking bay which held the Gymsnor-2 light freighter Scupper Bantoo.

While on a trading junket, he was killed by an Aing-Tii ship, a vessel belonging to a mysterious alien race that held a deep hatred of slavers. Upon his death, Macatten found herself free and left Kal'Shebbol with the Scupper Bantoo.
